about.summary: TinyXML2 is a simple, small, efficient, C++ XML parser that can be easily integrated into other programs.

name: tinyxml2
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "tinyxml2" %}
{% set version = "7.1.0" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/leethomason/{{ name }}/archive/{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 68ebd396a4220d5a9b5a621c6e9c66349c5cfdf5efaea3f16e3bb92e45f4e2a3
  folder: source

build:
  number: 0
  skip: true  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake

test:
  requires:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - pkg-config
  source_files:
    - source/xmltest.cpp
    - source/resources
  commands:
    - cd source
    - ${CXX} xmltest.cpp -o xmltest $(pkg-config tinyxml2 --cflags --libs)
    # Fix up the runpath on macOS
    - ${INSTALL_NAME_TOOL} -change @rpath/libtinyxml2.{{ version.split('.')[0] }}.dylib $CONDA_PREFIX/lib/libtinyxml2.{{ version.split('.')[0] }}.dylib xmltest  # [osx]
    - ./xmltest

about:
  home: http://leethomason.github.io/tinyxml2/
  license: zlib
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'TinyXML2 is a simple, small, efficient, C++ XML parser that can be easily integrated into other programs.'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - gartung
    - chrisburr
    - henryiii
